LanguageData.MD2_deepstorage_research_DSU_i.label: Deep Storage Unit Mk.I
LanguageData.MD2_deepstorage_research_DSU_i.descripti: Unlocks researching Deep Storage Units, which are capable of holding large amounts of an item. (10x)

LanguageData.MD2_deepstorage_research_DSU_ii.descript: Unlocks researching Deep Storage Units, which are capable of holding large amounts of an item. (20x)
LanguageData.MD2_deepstorage_research_DSU_iii.label: Deep Storage Unit Mk.III
LanguageData.MD2_deepstorage_research_DSU_iii.descrip: Unlocks researching Deep Storage Units, which are capable of holding large amounts of an item. (30x)
